profile.title: Profile.
profile.p1: I've been working with Salesforce, CRM, and cloud systems for over ten years — from operational administration to responsibility for complex solution and integration landscapes in enterprise and mid-market environments.
profile.p2: In roles as Salesforce Solution Architect, Senior Administrator, and external consultant, I have designed, restructured, migrated, and operated systems stably over several years.
profile.p3: My focus is on solution design and decision work: structuring requirements, cleanly defining system boundaries, securing integrations, and evaluating technical options under real organizational conditions.

philosophy.p1: I work where CRM systems are business-critical and technical decisions have long-term impact.
philosophy.p2: My standard is clarity: comprehensible solution architecture, resilient integrations, and decisions that teams can sustain long-term.
philosophy.p3: Good CRM solutions don't emerge from tool focus, but from clean interplay of processes, data, and responsibilities.

cta.text: Whether architecture review, solution design, or decision support — I look forward to your message.
